questions.question: What is the predominant color of the main body of the device?
What is the apparent material of the device's main body?
What shape best describes the overall form of the main device?
What type of display is visibly integrated into the device?
What is the apparent color of the smaller, interchangeable attachments?
What is the visible material of the interchangeable attachments?
How many different attachments are shown alongside the main device?

What kind of buttons or controls are visible on the device's body?
What is the apparent shape of each of the interchangeable attachments?

What is the visible design feature that shows different levels of cleaning intensity?
What type of power source does the device imply through its design (lack of cord)?
